note.p: Daughter of Edward Andrew Noel of Alvington, Gloucestershire, and his wife Sarah Gay Forbes Noel née Darwin; granddaughter of William Brown Darwin of Elston. Married Thomas Hamilton Forsyth (1844–1936), army officer, in 1873.
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 31 May 2021)
Gloucestershire Church of England parish registers Gdr/V1/442 (Ancestry.com, accessed 31 May 2021)
